ScriptGroup.name: AR NDB
ScriptGroup.script: arn = arn or {} if ar then arn.file = ar.file .. "/NDB" else arn.file = getMudletHomeDir() .. "/NDB" end if not lfs.attributes(arn.file) then lfs.mkdir(arn.file) end if not lfs.attributes(arn.file .. "/who tables") then lfs.mkdir(arn.file .. "/who tables") end if not lfs.attributes(arn.file .. "/players") then lfs.mkdir(arn.file .. "/players") end arn.getWhoList() if arn.getWhoTimer then killTimer(arn.getWhoTimer) end arn.getWhoTimer = tempTimer( 30, function() arn.getWhoList() end, true ) arn.manualCityList = arn.manualCityList or {} if io.exists(arn.file .. "/manual city table") then table.load(arn.file .. "/manual city table", arn.manualCityList) end arn.cityColors = arn.cityColors or { ["hashan"] = "orange", ["ashtan"] = "magenta", ["cyrene"] = "DodgerBlue", ["targossas"] = "khaki", ["mhaldor"] = "red", ["eleusis"] = "ForestGreen", ["(none)"] = "grey", ["(hidden)"] = "SkyBlue", } arn.highlights = arn.highlights or {city = {}, cityEnemy = {}, myEnemy = {}, orderEnemy = {}, watchFor = {}} arn.people = arn.people or {}

Script.name: get who list
Script.script: arn.getWhoList = function() local path = arn.file .. "/who tables" downloadFile(path .. "/wholist.json", "http:\/\/api.achaea.com\/characters.json") end

Script.name: populate people table
Script.script: arn.downloadPlayerInfo = function(event, arg) if event == "sysDownloadDone" and string.find(arg, "wholist") then arn.people = arn.people or {} arn.who = {} local t = {} local f, s = io.open(arn.file .. "/who tables/wholist.json") if f then s = f:read("*l"):trim(); io.close(f) end t = yajl.to_value(s) for i = 1, #t.characters do downloadFile( arn.file .. "/players/" .. t.characters[i].name .. ".json", t.characters[i].uri ) table.insert(arn.who, t.characters[i].name) end end if event == "sysDownloadDone" and string.find(arg, "players") then for player in string.gmatch(arg, arn.file .. "/players/(%w+)") do local f, s = io.open(arn.file .. "/players/" .. player .. ".json") if f then s = f:read("*l"):trim(); io.close(f) end arn.people[player] = yajl.to_value(s) arn.cityHighLight(player) end end end registerAnonymousEventHandler("sysDownloadDone", "arn.downloadPlayerInfo")

Script.name: city highlight
Script.script: arn.cityHighLight = function(who) if arn.highlights.city[who] then killTrigger(arn.highlights.city[who]) end if arn.people[who] and arn.people[who].city then if arn.people[who].city == "(hidden)" then if table.contains(arn.manualCityList, tostring(who)) == false then cechoLink( "<gold>" .. who .. "<white> city hidden, manual honors required", [[arn.manualHonors("]] .. who .. [[")]], "click to manual honors " .. who, true ) else arn.people[who].city = arn.manualCityList[who] end end if arn.cityColors[arn.people[who].city] then arn.highlights.city[who] = tempRegexTrigger( who, function() selectString(tostring(who), 1) fg(arn.cityColors[arn.people[who].city]) deselect() resetFormat() end ) end end end

Script.name: manual info
Script.script: arn.manualInfo = function(who) downloadFile( arn.file .. "/players/" .. who .. ".json", "https:\/\/api.achaea.com\/characters\/" .. who .. ".json" ) end

Script.name: manual honors
Script.script: arn.manualHonors = function(who) if arn.highlights.city[who] then killTimer(arn.highlights.city[who]) end if not arn.people[who] then arn.manualInfo(who) return end send("queue addclear eqbal honors " .. who) tempRegexTrigger( [[\w+ is (?:a|an) \w+ in (\w+)\.]], function() arn.manualCityList[who] = matches[2]:lower() arn.people[who].city = matches[2]:lower() table.save(arn.file .. "/manual city table", arn.manualCityList) end, 1 ) if arn.people[who].city == "(hidden)" then arn.people[who].city = "(none)" arn.manualCityList[who] = "(none)" table.save(arn.file .. "/manual city table", arn.manualCityList) end end

Script.name: city report
Script.script:
arn.cityReport = function(city) local t = {} for _, k in pairs(arn.who) do if arn.people[k].city and arn.people[k].city == city:lower() then t[k] = {class = arn.people[k].class, level = arn.people[k].level} end end cecho( "
<" .. arn.cityColors[city:lower()] .. ">" .. string.rep(" ", (getColumnCount() / 6) - (#city / 2)) .. city:title() ) cecho("
<white>@" .. string.rep("-", getColumnCount() / 3) .. "@
") for k, _ in pairs(t) do cecho( "
<" .. arn.cityColors[city:lower()] .. ">" .. k .. string.rep(" ", getColumnCount() / 10 - #k) .. "<white>class : " .. t[k].class .. string.rep(" ", getColumnCount() / 9 -#t[k].class) .. "Lvl : " .. t[k].level ) end cecho("

<white>@" .. string.rep("-", getColumnCount() / 3) .. "@") end

Script.name: person report
Script.script:
arn.personReport = function(who) if not arn.people[who] then arn.manualInfo(who) return cecho("
Getting " .. who .. "'s info, please resubmit your inquiry!") end cecho( "
<white>" .. string.rep(" ", (getColumnCount() / 6) - (#arn.people[who].fullname / 2)) .. arn.people[who].fullname ) cecho("
<white>@" .. string.rep("-", getColumnCount() / 3) .. "@
") cecho("
<blue>City <gold> : <white> " .. arn.people[who].city:title()) cecho("
<blue>House <gold> : <white> " .. arn.people[who].house:title()) cecho("
<blue>Class <gold> : <white> " .. arn.people[who].class:title()) cecho("
<blue>Level <gold> : <white> " .. arn.people[who].level) cecho("
<blue>PK's <gold> : <white> " .. arn.people[who].player_kills) cecho("
<blue>XP rank <gold> : <white> " .. arn.people[who].xp_rank) cecho("
<blue>Exporer rank <gold> : <white> " .. arn.people[who].explorer_rank) cecho("

<white>@" .. string.rep("-", getColumnCount() / 3) .. "@") end
